info.name: Amazon Video Library Tweaks
info.description:
* Dark theme
* Focus on the items in the library
* Added styles for page which lists season's episodes.
* The screen shot shows the exact same screen area with the tweak and without.
info.additionalInfo:
2014-05-19
  - Hide more elements, including the reviews.
  - Tinkered with fixing the carousel.

2014-03-14
  - removed more clutter from Amazon Instant Video to make room for content
